overview: Maskurbate is proud to present Hung for Fun Volume 1. Days after his bodybuilding competition, Brad came to my place to show the amazing shape he was in. No doubt this was the perfect time for me to shoot him since he's been the model you wanted most to come back. I never impose the mask on my models. but sometimes it helps convince them to perform for me and do things they normally wouldn't do. I must admit that in Brad's case, I was eager for him to take the mask off. He is such a beautiful man. You would think that a guy like him would start eating and drinking like crazy after his competition. Well not at all, he's already looking forward to next year's competition. I'm glad that we'll be there to follow his progress, both on and off the gym! --Pascal
title: Hung for Fun 1
